General.Name: Bima Sakti Pertiwi Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bima Sakti Pertiwi Tbk operates as a property developer in Riau. It rents and manages shopping centers and hotel buildings. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Pekanbaru, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Jend Sudirman, No. 123 B, Pekanbaru, Indonesia, 28112
